content: Test existing 4-agent KWE system with complex project request

Fix agent initialization parameter mismatch in MetaCognitive agents
Test complete task execution through properly initialized agents
Achieve 100% KWE rule compliance by removing hardcoded heuristics
Implement proper PromptEngineeringService integration for agent selection
Test end-to-end KWE system with real Ollama reasoning and agent coordination
Fix execute_task interface mismatch between KWE system and DevelopmentAgent/QualityAgent
Create proper TaskContext objects in KWE server for BaseAgent interface

Test complete KWE system with all 4 agents using proper BaseAgent interface
Identify memory system connection issues and correct credentials
Update memory system configuration with correct database and authentication credentials
Update start and stop scripts with correct credentials for Neo4j and PostgreSQL
Test updated memory services scripts with correct credentials and service configuration
Complete comprehensive testing to identify all KWE system problems and gaps without coding
Fix KWE server import issues and remove dependency on legacy unified_mcp_server
Fix TaskResult constructor missing metadata parameter in MetaCognitive agents
Fix ollama_client string placeholder issue in agent initialization
